fields.Title: JAM / INSTIGATOR CABIN
fields.Description: The Instigator is gone but you can still explore the cabin of her abandoned vehicle. This yields some MAJOR foreshadowing.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Do the honours, he thinks. Connect..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do the honours, he thinks. Connect it yourself.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The movie stars are still smiling from the walls... the radio transmitter sits on the centre console and a faint smell of perfume is in the air.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it's not *shatterproof*. Give..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's not *shatterproof*. Give me that." He takes the prybar from you and gestures for you to step back. Then, with little warning...

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The ghostly actresses and the rusty..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The ghostly actresses and the rusty toolbox under the driver's seat. And the oddly bulging seat cover.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Nearly the same sound produced by t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nearly the same sound produced by the action on a good breechloader, you can't fail to notice.

fields.Title: You: ""This has *got* to be better than y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This has *got* to be better than your DynaWave."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsKimHere()  and  Variable["ice.kim_challenge_accepted"] == true  and  Variable["XP.made_kim_transceiver_jealous"] == false  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_examined_transceiver"] == true

fields.Title: You: "Put the transceiver away. (Conclude..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Put the transceiver away. (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: "Return the papers under the seat."
fields.Dialogue Text: Return the papers under the seat.

fields.Title: You: "Examine the radio."
fields.Dialogue Text: Examine the radio.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "She wasted away in a drug den calle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She wasted away in a drug den called 'The Door to the River', not far from here on Boogie Street. A mixture of cocaine and morphine. She was a afraid of the world. And the camera too.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You wedge yourself under the steeri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You wedge yourself under the steering-wheel to get a better look. Seems like the few tools lying around here -- a hammer, a pair of pliers, a rusty wrench -- have been casually thrown there by the disorganized driver.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "These are movie posters featuring s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These are movie posters featuring starlets from long-forgotten films -- from the Twenties, the Teens, even the Nineties of the last century.

fields.Title: You: "Raise your eyebrows."
fields.Dialogue Text: Raise your eyebrows.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What? I happen to have committed t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What? I happen to have committed the frequency to memory. I have no problem admitting that."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sandpaper?" the lieutenant repeats..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sandpaper?" the lieutenant repeats. "A novel technique... Must be to offer some extra grip to the driver's foot."

fields.Title: You: ""Looks like the driver has glued a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like the driver has glued a piece of sandpaper to the throttle to offer some extra grip."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We definitely need to return some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We definitely need to return some time later." He nods at the lorry. "We didn't get enough."

fields.Title: Volition: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi is a brave man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lieutenant Kitsuragi is a brave man for saying Madre's name without the winces and whispers that usually accompany it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...with *cool* names," he adds wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...with *cool* names," he adds with contempt. "Like *La Puta Madre* and *Ahura Mazda*. It's a dark parody."

fields.Title: Jump to: [discussing it with kim hub]
You: ""Fine, it appears we've reached a d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine, it appears we've reached a draw."

fields.Title: You: "Wait, the missing eighth Hardie?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, the missing eighth Hardie?

fields.Title: You: "Peel off the cover on the passenger..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Peel off the cover on the passenger seat.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "She is, yes. You should talk to Tit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She is, yes. You should talk to Titus about it, now you have some concrete evidence.

fields.Title: You: "Unlock the door with the key Tommy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unlock the door with the key Tommy gave you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Use the prybar to smash the window..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Use the prybar to smash the window. Open it from the inside."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The actress is draped in a sheath d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The actress is draped in a sheath dress, one of her shoulders bared. The faded remains of an autograph run across the poster. She's looking past the camera.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "It looks like an article ripped out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It looks like an article ripped out from a radio-enthusiast magazine. Complex mathematical equations explain the basics of something called 'the ULAN frequency system'.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "These formulas look oddly *painful*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These formulas look oddly *painful*. Maybe it's the hangover, but they give you a headache.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant leans over your shou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant leans over your shoulder to examine the note: "The ULAN frequency system? I've never heard of that before. I know of FM, AM, UKV, but..." His thought trails off.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "Looks like the frequency dial is ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like the frequency dial is absent. It requires a key to work, but the key has been removed -- likely by the missing lady driver.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hard to say. This distribution net..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hard to say. This distribution network looks certainly large, yet still vague enough... It doesn't reveal much about the *besmertie* behind it."

fields.Title: Shivers: "There, hundreds of thousands of mot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There, hundreds of thousands of motor carriages roar on the 8/81, high above the mass of brown and red roofs that is Jamrock. The commuters don't even look down; the world ceases to exist outside the windshield.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You should probably still talk to t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should probably still talk to them, see what they've got to say for themselves.

fields.Title: You: ""Looks like the driver has glued a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like the driver has glued a piece of sandpaper to fix the slippery throttle of their FALN A-Z 'Tempo'."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."]
You: "The entire Union might be involved...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The entire Union might be involved. Maybe even all of Martinaise... (Look around suspiciously.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The smell of cigarettes and perfume..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""This has been hard enough. No need..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This has been hard enough. No need to make it any harder." The lieutenant takes the prybar from you and gestures for you to step back. Then, with short warning...

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Another futile *thunk* sounds in th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Another futile *thunk* sounds in the brisk coastal air.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm," he nods and gives you the to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm," he nods and gives you the tool back. "It went better than I expected -- open it from the inside."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The smell of a thousand cigarettes,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The smell of a thousand cigarettes, some dead actresses and a rusty old toolbox under the seat...

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You close the rusty old lorry door."
fields.Dialogue Text: You close the rusty old lorry door.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Call down the hammer of truth and j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Call down the hammer of truth and justice! With a firm punch that could shatter bone, you smash through the window. Why you didn't equip and use the prybar, who knows -- but now, release your secrets, lorry cabin!

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."]
Physical Instrument: "With a firm grip you raise the pryb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With a firm grip you raise the prybar, a glint of light catching on the tip. Call down the hammer of truth and justice! Release your secrets, lorry cabin!

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "A lorry, abandoned by its owner, st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A lorry, abandoned by its owner, stuck in the interminable traffic jam.
fields.Alternate1: This FALN A-Z, abandoned by its owner, still stands in the shadow of the ruins above it.

fields.Title: Logic: "Looks like the window might be shat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like the window might be shatterproof. You may have to rethink your approach.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Doesn't look like it -- it's compl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Doesn't look like it -- it's completely inoperable without the dial key."

fields.Title: You: ""First the drug smuggling, now this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First the drug smuggling, now this... How deep does this rabbit hole go?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, well..." He quickly disregard..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, well..." He quickly disregards your statement as another one of your  neurotic outbursts.

fields.Title: You: ""Those jerks? Definitely.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those jerks? Definitely."

fields.Title: You: "Open the door."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open the door.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "This is the one he pointed to. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is the one he pointed to. The green lorry...

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sorry, it didn't happen.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry, it didn't happen."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The smell of a thousand cigarettes,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The smell of a thousand cigarettes, some dead actresses and a rusty old toolbox under the seat.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To be perfectly frank, I have my r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To be perfectly frank, I have my reservations about this whole antenna scheme. But who knows? We may yet be surprised."

fields.Title: You: ""Not necessarily. The lady driver c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not necessarily. The lady driver could have kept the drug trade a secret."
fields.Alternate1: "Not necessarily. Ruby could have kept the drug trade a secret."

fields.Title: You: "How am I going to get this open?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How am I going to get this open?
fields.Alternate1: "How are we going to get this open, Kim?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "Wind rips through the empty hallway..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wind rips through the empty hallways of the once great military hospital, now just a ruin under an overgrown park. Beneath the hospital, great sewer tunnels hum and vibrate with life of their own...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Despite the cold, figures move abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Despite the cold, figures move about cloaked in shadow, their breath escaping in white clouds that fade into the darkness. Wherever you look, the night gives cover to her messengers.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "God damn, maggot! Drag your ass to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: God damn, maggot! Drag your ass to the gym and do some reps right now!

fields.Title: You: "But why the sandpaper?"
fields.Dialogue Text: But why the sandpaper?

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["jam.abandoned_blackc_interface_pedal"] == false  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_blackc_logic_pedal_extra_grip"] == false  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What a novel technique..." The lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What a novel technique..." The lieutenant leans closer. "You sure do know your lorries, officer."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should talk with Titus, see wha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should talk with Titus, see what he's got to say on the matter." He writes something down into his little notebook. "Are we finished with the lorry?"

fields.Title: You: "Not necessarily. The lady driver co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not necessarily. The lady driver could have kept the drug trade a secret.
fields.Alternate1: Not necessarily. Ruby could have kept the drug trade a secret.

fields.Title: You: "This would fit what Joyce told us,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This would fit what Joyce told us, but I don't want to make any assumptions.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The peculiar frequency tableau indi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The peculiar frequency tableau indicates that at least 128 stations have been saved on this radio.

fields.Title: You: "Look around the cabin. (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: Look around the cabin. (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "It takes a few moments, but eventua..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It takes a few moments, but eventually the transceiver slides from its greased socket mount with an eminently satisfying *chhhnk*.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "Where the transceiver used to be, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Where the transceiver used to be, there's just a rectangular shadow now.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "That's the marque of Esterhaz Elekt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's the marque of Esterhaz Elektronika, one of the major manufacturers of advanced radio equipment.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You close the rusty old lorry door."
fields.Dialogue Text: You close the rusty old lorry door.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The glass on the side windows is ti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The glass on the side windows is tinted and covered with dust. You can barely make out the shape of a seat and two steering levers.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The smell of cigarettes and perfume..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The smell of cigarettes and perfume welcomes you. The cabin inside is plastered with old movie posters, actresses smile from the walls. There's a radio transmitter in the front and a toolbox tucked under the driver's seat. Some tools lie scattered near the pedals.
fields.Alternate1: The smell of cigarettes and perfume welcomes you. The cabin inside is plastered with old movie posters, actresses smile from the walls. There's a rectangular shadow where the radio used to be and a toolbox tucked under the driver's seat. Some tools lie scattered near the pedals.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "The remnants of a sweet juniper-sce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The remnants of a sweet juniper-scented perfume. Probably 'Granate No 5'.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This has been hard enough. No need..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This has been hard enough. No need to make it any harder."

fields.Title: You: ""One of the footprints at the crime..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One of the footprints at the crime scene had an aberration -- one sole was smoother than the other."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Understood. We should still go and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood. We should still go and see what Titus has got to say on the matter." He writes something down into his little notebook. "Are we finished with the lorry?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should see what Titus has got t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should see what Titus has got to say on the matter." He writes something down into his little notebook. "Are we finished with the lorry?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great, I think we got everything...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great, I think we got everything. A word, detective?" He steps away from the lorry. "*Before* we return to Joyce."

fields.Title: You: "What about the Speedfreaks FM? Is i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What about the Speedfreaks FM? Is it one of the saved stations here?

fields.Title: You: ""Where does the contraband end up?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where does the contraband end up?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [discussing it with kim hub]
Abandoned Lorry: "This green FALN A-Z 'Contemporain'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This green FALN A-Z 'Contemporain' is parked in the shadow of the ruins looming overhead. It's seen better days.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's get the prybar from my Kinee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's get the prybar from my Kineema and smash in the window."

fields.Title: You: "Just open the door from the inside."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just open the door from the inside.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm more interested in *why* you'r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm more interested in *why* you're so fixated on this idea in the first place."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But now you've got what you came f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But now you've got what you came for, so I suppose we'll have to see this business through."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You close the rusty old lorry door..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You close the rusty old lorry door for now -- your job here isn't done yet.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "But one odd detail does catch your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But one odd detail does catch your eye: A piece of sandpaper has been glued to the throttle.

fields.Title: You: "Look around the cabin again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look around the cabin again.

fields.Title: You: "Women... (Shake your head.) Always..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Women... (Shake your head.) Always the most *deceitful* ones.

fields.Title: You: ""I think the entire Union is involv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think the entire Union is involved. Maybe even all of Martinaise..." (Look around suspiciously.)

fields.Title: You: "Why would anyone need so many radio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why would anyone need so many radio stations?

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The door is locked. The handle look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The door is locked. The handle looks shiny, like it's recently replaced.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "But you don't *have* a prybar. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But you don't *have* a prybar. The lieutenant would, but he drove away with it in his toolbox.

fields.Title: You: ""Really?" (Hit again.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?" (Hit again.)

fields.Title: You: ""I don't really get jokes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't really get jokes."

fields.Title: You: ""That's okay. As long as it works.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's okay. As long as it works."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "Looks like it, yes."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like it, yes.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, Ruby?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, Ruby?"

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."]
You: ""Why would anyone glue a piece of s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why would anyone glue a piece of sandpaper to the gas pedal?"

fields.Title: You: ""And she's also the one running the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And she's also the one running the drug trade... What a handful."

fields.Title: You: "Those jerks? Definitely."
fields.Dialogue Text: Those jerks? Definitely.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "It has to be an advanced model to f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It has to be an advanced model to fit so many frequencies next to each other without blending them together.

fields.Title: Jump to: [discussing it with kim hub]
You: ""Good idea.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good idea."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Good thing you have one!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Good thing you have one!

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "He smashes it into the window. Drop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He smashes it into the window. Droplets of glass fly everywhere, shattering over the lorry floor and pavement. You can just reach in now.

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*You* could reach the Coalition an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*You* could reach the Coalition and have your talk about *la responsabilit*... *I* could grow 10 centimetres and become a flanker for the Stormers."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I certainly understand the impulse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I certainly understand the impulse, but this is our job, detective. Our whole *raison d'tre*. At some point, we'll need to return to it."

fields.Title: You: "Admire the posters."
fields.Dialogue Text: Admire the posters.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "There's definitely perfume in the a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's definitely perfume in the air. It's spicy, with a hint of ambrette, wafting through the bitter air of the cabin.

fields.Title: You: "Smash it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smash it.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The movie stars are still smiling from the walls. There's a radio transmitter in the front and a pull-out toolbox tucked under the driver's seat. Some tools lie scattered near the pedals.
fields.Alternate1: The movie stars are still smiling from the walls... But there's something strange about the passenger seat. The radio transmitter sits on the centre console and the pull-out toolbox lies hidden under the driver's seat. Some tools lie scattered near the pedals.
fields.Alternate2: The movie stars are still smiling from the walls... But there's a rectangular shadow where the radio used to be and something strange about the passenger seat. The pull-out toolbox lies hidden under the driver's seat. Some tools have been left scattered near the pedals.
fields.Alternate3: The movie stars are still smiling from the walls... But there's a rectangular shadow where the radio used to be. The pull-out toolbox lies hidden under the driver's seat. Some tools have been left scattered near the pedals.

fields.Title: You: "Look at the third map."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the third map.

fields.Title: You: "Return the papers under the seat."
fields.Dialogue Text: Return the papers under the seat.

fields.Title: You: "Where does the road lead..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Where does the road lead...

fields.Title: Shivers: "They travel from Eminent Domain to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They travel from Eminent Domain to Perdition and on to the Main. Over the River Esperance, on Route 8/81 to the Old South -- the exit ramp is supposed to be shut down, but there's much activity.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like we're dealing with an i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like we're dealing with an impressive organizational tool -- the nerve centre of a huge operation. With quite the range too."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "Doesn't look like it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Doesn't look like it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let me make a prediction, detectiv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let me make a prediction, detective. You are not going to see the inside of a Coalition warship anytime soon."

fields.Title: You: ""So you're not jealous?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you're not jealous?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Not just any face... it reminds you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not just any face... it reminds you of the grotesque carvings sometimes found in prehistoric caves.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "With a key -- or a tool. Like, say,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With a key -- or a tool. Like, say, a prybar.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "There's something odd about the pas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's something odd about the passenger seat... The seating fabric has been pulled tight over the lower side of the seat where the toolbox should be.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sorry." (Smash it, apologetica..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry." (Smash it, apologetically.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So it would seem." The lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So it would seem." The lieutenant examines the maps with a furrowed brow.

fields.Title: You: ""*Besmertie*? That sounds vaguely f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Besmertie*? That sounds vaguely familiar."

fields.Title: Shivers: "The road spreads like the tentacles..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The road spreads like the tentacles of a great octopus.

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: "Back up into the cabin again."]
Abandoned Lorry: "You close the rusty old lorry door."
fields.Dialogue Text: You close the rusty old lorry door.

fields.Title: You: "Return the stack of papers under th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Return the stack of papers under the seat.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The smell of cigarettes and perfume..."]
Reaction Speed: "This is the one the man pointed to...."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is the one the man pointed to. His friend's lorry.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The actresses -- and the rare actor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The actresses -- and the rare actor -- all smile you a warm good bye. A radio transmitter is attached to the dashboard and a toolbox sits under the driver's seat.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The ghostly actresses and the rusty..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The ghostly actresses and the rusty toolbox, under the driver's seat... And the oddly bulging seat cover.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, I didn't mean that. It's just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, I didn't mean that. It's just ironic that you're using the lady driver's radio to contact the very authorities she was so keen to evade."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""An Esterhaz is certainly nothing t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An Esterhaz is certainly nothing to sniff at." The lieutenant nods. "But if you compare the feature sets, I would say they're more-or-less equivalent."

fields.Title: You: ""So Ruby really is running a *compl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So Ruby really is running a *complex operation* out of her lorry."

fields.Title: You: "Pull out the pull-out toolbox."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pull out the pull-out toolbox.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "Voila! A stack of neatly folded pap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Voila! A stack of neatly folded papers has been stashed behind the seating fabric. You see three maps depicting a large metropolitan area. It's Revachol, some of its routes and highways have been outlined with a pen.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "This is Tippe Tijonne, a starlet fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is Tippe Tijonne, a starlet from the dawn of cinematography. Less known for her talent, than her tragic, untimely death.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "She's delicate, yet lost. Ruined un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's delicate, yet lost. Ruined underneath it all.

fields.Title: You: "Push in the pull-out toolbox."
fields.Dialogue Text: Push in the pull-out toolbox.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Best not to disturb the scene." Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Best not to disturb the scene." The lieutenant nods. "I'll have Forensics go over the lorry and pick these up later."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Wait, this actress really does look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, this actress really does look *a lot* like Klaasje. She may have been right about this Ruby after all...

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "One of them particularly catches yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One of them particularly catches your eye: a centrefold of an ingnue attached right above the back seat.

fields.Title: You: ""Really?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "As you take the transceiver in your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you take the transceiver in your hands, the lieutenant bites his lower lip, apparently deep in thought.

fields.Title: You: "Examine the transceiver."
fields.Dialogue Text: Examine the transceiver.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, another draw. It appears we a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, another draw. It appears we are quite equally matched."

fields.Title: You: "Try to peek in the window."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try to peek in the window.
fields.Alternate1: Try to peek in the window.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "A metallic drawer slides out from t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A metallic drawer slides out from the seat: It's empty, except for a folded newspaper.

fields.Title: You: "Fold open the topmost map."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fold open the topmost map.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""But why... why would I hurt my own..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But why... why would I hurt my own *peone*?" asks the man in white. "What kind of an *animal* would do such thing?"

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "Tollbooths at the intakes are marke..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Tollbooths at the intakes are marked with a circle. It looks like there are scant few ways of getting onto the elevated motorway that runs over Jamrock -- and this person knows them all.

fields.Title: You: ""The sandpaper would also rub off t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The sandpaper would also rub off the pattern from the driver's right boot sole."

fields.Title: You: "Back up into the cabin again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Back up into the cabin again.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The smell of cigarettes and perfume..."]
Abandoned Lorry: "You stuff the maps back under the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You stuff the maps back under the seat cover. Better not to leave traces of you being here yet... the movie stars look silently by.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, sounds just like an old bree..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, sounds just like an old breechloader."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've no reason to be jealous, dete..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've no reason to be jealous, detective." The lieutenant smiles to himself.

fields.Title: You: "Return the papers under the seat."
fields.Dialogue Text: Return the papers under the seat.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."]
Inland Empire: "A feeling of tenderness washes over..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A feeling of tenderness washes over you -- a longing even, perhaps. And gentle tragedy.

fields.Title: Shivers: "To Couron, through the middle incom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: To Couron, through the middle income neighbourhoods there -- by the river -- and then to Stella Maris and La Delta, for work. While the men and women of Jamrock scuttle to their fates below the road.

fields.Title: You: ""What does all this mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What does all this mean?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's definitely not the Union. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's definitely not the Union. They just do *some* logistics. This operation has spread everywhere in Jamrock. If it's that widespread, then Madre remains the most likely suspect."

fields.Title: Logic: "Sandpaper adds extra grip."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sandpaper adds extra grip.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "... matching one of the footprints..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... matching one of the footprints found from the crime scene. Which means that the missing lady driver was present at the lynching!

fields.Title: You: ""Women.." (Shake your head.) "Alway..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Women.." (Shake your head.) "Always up to something."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For contacting an entire fleet of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For contacting an entire fleet of lorrymen, for example." He flicks a switch on the radio. "This is all shortwave, UW and UKV..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know how *good* it is, but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know how *good* it is, but this investigation has taken long enough. We can't afford it to take any longer."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So it would appear.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So it would appear."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, the missing eighth Hardie? H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, the missing eighth Hardie? Here?"

fields.Title: You: "Return the stack of papers under th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Return the stack of papers under the seat. (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: "Ruby really is running a *complex o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ruby really is running a *complex operation* out of her lorry.

fields.Title: You: "Study the centrefold."
fields.Dialogue Text: Study the centrefold.

fields.Title: You: "What happened to her?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What happened to her?

fields.Title: You: "Stop and wonder: What's that smell?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop and wonder: What's that smell?

fields.Title: Interfacing: "This particular lorry is a FALN A-Z..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This particular lorry is a FALN A-Z 'Tempo', a model infamous for its irritating design mistake: the slippery-smooth throttles.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Adapting a high-quality radio-trans..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Adapting a high-quality radio-transmitter to emit this frequency may make it powerful enough to transmit a signal from isola to isola. But that's just a guess.

fields.Title: You: ""What about the Speedfreaks FM? Is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about the Speedfreaks FM? Is it one of the saved stations here?"

fields.Title: You: ""Is there anything we can do with t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is there anything we can do with the radio?"

fields.Title: You: ""What else is here..." (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "What else is here..." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Somewhere on a hidden field, a flas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere on a hidden field, a flash of light, a whirring sound. Camera lenses focus on a man in a ragged police uniform standing in a field of blood-red poppies. A blurry figure dressed in white stands right by the camera...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "The bedraggled cop is holding a man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bedraggled cop is holding a manure fork. "Don't hurt me," he whimpers.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "These service tunnels were probably..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These service tunnels were probably used during the construction of the foundation beneath the motorway.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "A 20 kilometre radius at least. Per..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A 20 kilometre radius at least. Perhaps extended by an attachable antenna that's not here right now?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This must be the one he told us ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This must be the one he told us about. Unless he was lying..." The lieutenant peeks inside.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Bonne prise*," the lieutenant com..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Bonne prise*," the lieutenant commends you as you shift through the treasure -- well worn and folded into neat squares.

fields.Title: You: ""We can't assign *la responsabilit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We can't assign *la responsabilit* if we don't go through the proper channels."

fields.Title: You: ""I think I just need a break from o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I just need a break from our main case for a bit."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The window shatters and droplets of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The window shatters and droplets of glass fly everywhere, shattering over the lorry floor and pavement.

fields.Title: You: "Enough of the posters."
fields.Dialogue Text: Enough of the posters.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant leans closer to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant leans closer to the radio and hums: "Strange. There are so many radio stations saved here... must be over one hundred at least."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The cluttered cabin of the abandone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cluttered cabin of the abandoned lorry offers no reply.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The throttle underneath looks as sm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The throttle underneath looks as smooth as glass, slippery even... The sandpaper must be there to add some extra *grip*!

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You've identified the missing eight..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've identified the missing eighth person at the lynching. Do you think that Hardie and his boys had anything to do with the drug trade?
fields.Alternate1: This looks like proof the missing eighth person at the lynching was Ruby. Do you think that Hardie and his 'boys' could also be involved in the drug operation?

fields.Title: Interfacing: "It has to be an advanced model to f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It has to be an advanced model to fit so many frequencies next to each other without blending them together.

fields.Title: You: "Is there anything I can do with the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is there anything I can do with the radio?

fields.Title: Logic: "Looks like the smugglers have infil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like the smugglers have infiltrated the road network belonging to East Motor Tract.

fields.Title: You: ""Nice.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nice."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not really a *joke*, per se...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not really a *joke*, per se. Just ironic that you're using the lady driver's radio to contact the very authorities she was so keen to evade."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't like to guess. Your per..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wouldn't like to guess. Your performance so far doesn't exactly inspire confidence, but all sorts of things are possible..."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You close the rusty old lorry door..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You close the rusty old lorry door -- your job here is done.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At least we can now ask Titus some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least we can now ask Titus some concrete questions about it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's *bad news*." The lieutenant r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's *bad news*." The lieutenant removes his glasses and polishes them with a handkerchief. "There have been attempts at a serious investigation before, but they... haven't ended well for those involved."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The RCM patrols most of these auxi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The RCM patrols most of these auxiliary roads, though apparently not all of them."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Wait, doesn't she... resemble someo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, doesn't she... resemble someone you know? But you can't put a finger on *whom* exactly.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "No idea... You could peel off the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No idea... You could peel off the sandpaper to peak underneath, but that would be tampering with the scene.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sandpaper?" the lieutenant repeats..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sandpaper?" the lieutenant repeats. "A novel technique..."

fields.Title: You: "The sandpaper would also rub off th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sandpaper would also rub off the pattern from the driver's right boot sole...

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["jam.abandoned_blackc_interface_pedal"] == true  or  Variable["jam.abandoned_blackc_logic_pedal_extra_grip"] == true  and  IsKimHere() == false  and  Variable["tc.oddfoot_at_lynching"] == true

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."]
Abandoned Lorry: "This green FALN A-Z 'Contemporain'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This green FALN A-Z 'Contemporain' is parked in the shadow of the ruins looming overhead. It's seen better days.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "There's no picking this lock. The o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no picking this lock. The owner has put special care into it. It's a recessed design.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The stack of maps looks just like b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The stack of maps looks just like before -- barely noticeable. The movie stars look silently by and the pull-out toolbox has a rubber handle, worn from years of use.

fields.Title: You: ""Do you think we'll actually be abl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think we'll actually be able to reach the Coalition with this?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It should. Assuming we can find a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It should. Assuming we can find a way to replace the frequency dial."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like her, yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like her, yes."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "It's an issue of 'Priphrique' fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's an issue of 'Priphrique' from last Wednesday. A piece of paper falls out from its pages.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."]
You: "Fold open the second map."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fold open the second map.

fields.Title: You: "Where are they going?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where are they going?

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "If only Lieutenant Kitsuragi were h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If only Lieutenant Kitsuragi were here to help you piece together the evidence.

fields.Title: You: "I don't care about rules, I need to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't care about rules, I need to get some *results*! (Peel off the sandpaper.)

fields.Title: You: "I could just take a peak... A teens..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I could just take a peak... A teensy-weensy peek... (Peel off just the edge.)

fields.Title: You: ""This would fit what Joyce told us,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This would fit what Joyce told us, but I don't want to make any assumptions."

fields.Title: Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_article"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_posters"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_radio"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_pedals"] == true

Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_article"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_posters"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_radio"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_pedals"] == true

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_article"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_posters"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_radio"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_pedals"] == true

fields.Title: !(Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_article"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_posters"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_radio"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_pedals"] == true)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_article"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_posters"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_radio"] == true  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_pedals"] == true) == false

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "Unclear."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unclear.

fields.Title: Logic: "For contacting an entire fleet of l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For contacting an entire fleet of lorries, for example. This must be the nerve centre of a well-organized operation.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You push the key into the lock and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You push the key into the lock and turn. It makes a cracking sound -- then the door pops back a few centimetres. You can just...

fields.Title: You: "Open it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open it.

fields.Title: You: "Remove the radio transceiver."
fields.Dialogue Text: Remove the radio transceiver.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Funny, isn't it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Funny, isn't it?"

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "It's about the size of a small pavi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's about the size of a small paving stone, and nearly as heavy. Now that you're looking at it more closely, you realise the various dials and meters make it look vaguely like a face. A distinctive triangular logo forms the nose.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The movie stars are still smiling f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The movie stars are still smiling from the walls... the radio transmitter sits on the centre console and a faint smell of perfume is in the air.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Prybar in hand, you take a hard swi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Prybar in hand, you take a hard swing at the window. A loud *thunk* rings out and the prybar bounces back, leaving a tiny spider web on the glass.

fields.Title: You: ""Why would anyone need so many radi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why would anyone need so many radio stations?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "Especially bad news for cops who ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Especially bad news for cops who may have something in their past they don't even *know* is there.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No storm will ever drown Revachol,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No storm will ever drown Revachol, the great solution to the riddle of history.

fields.Title: You: "Say "Fuck the police!" and *then* s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say "Fuck the police!" and *then* smash it.

fields.Title: You: "First the drug smuggling, now this...."
fields.Dialogue Text: First the drug smuggling, now this... How deep does this rabbit hole go?

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You've identified one of the footpr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've identified one of the footprints, but there are still seven to go...

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "Not without the dial key, no."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not without the dial key, no.

fields.Title: You: ""The window appears to be shatterpr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The window appears to be shatterproof."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've surprised me more than once..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've surprised me more than once during the course of our investigation, but I have to say it still seems like a *remote* scenario." He shrugs.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But here's the thing, detective. *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But here's the thing, detective. *We're* the proper channels. Doing our work, right here on the ground, is how we'll solve this case. There's no need to bring the Coalition into this."

fields.Title: You: "Wait, Ruby?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, Ruby?

fields.Title: You: "[Close the door.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Close the door.]

fields.Title: You: "Open the door."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open the door.

fields.Title: You: "Check the pedals."
fields.Dialogue Text: Check the pedals.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Subtle," says the lieutenant and s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Subtle," says the lieutenant and sticks his hand in the window -- like a common car thief -- and then opens it.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The pull-out toolbox slides back in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The pull-out toolbox slides back into its nest. The rest is as it was: radio, posters, a trace of motor oil smell under all the cigarettes.
fields.Alternate1: The pull-out toolbox slides back into its nest. The rest is as it was: posters, a radio, dust on the windows.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, that's on 78.9." He stops, cou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, that's on 78.9." He stops, coughing awkwardly.

fields.Title: You: ""Who do you think is behind this?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who do you think is behind this?"

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "The final map displays a labyrinth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The final map displays a labyrinth of service tunnels left over from the construction of Motorway 8/81. A few routes have been marked with a pen -- where the tunnels and sewers surface near the Eminent Domain and a traffic island in Central Jamrock, by the lake.

fields.Title: You: ""The smugglers have infiltrated the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The smugglers have infiltrated the Motor Tract."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It means that the smugglers are se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It means that the smugglers are secretly using the motorway to transport their goods and materials. They've infiltrated East Motor Tract, most likely..."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "There's something odd about the pas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's something odd about the passenger seat... The seating fabric has been pulled tight over the lower side of the seat where the toolbox should be.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now we know for *certain* who's th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now we know for *certain* who's the missing eighth person at the lynching. Do you think that Hardie and his boys could also be involved in the drug operation?"
fields.Alternate1: "This looks like proof the missing eighth person at the lynching was Ruby... Do you think that Hardie and his 'boys' could also be involved in the drug operation?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We've identified one of the footpr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've identified one of the footprints, but there are still seven to go..." He writes something in his little blue notebook.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Which means that the missing lady..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Which means that the missing lady driver was present at the lynching." The lieutenant's eyes light up behind his prescription lens.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "You should talk to them, see what t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should talk to them, see what they've got to say for themselves.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It feels like you're peeking into s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It feels like you're peeking into someone's home residence. Inside it's private, cozy, warm. Dusty, too.

fields.Title: You: "Open the door from the inside."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open the door from the inside.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who's to say what's possible and w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who's to say what's possible and what's not?"

fields.Title: You: "Unfold the newspaper."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unfold the newspaper.

fields.Title: You: "Pick up the note."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pick up the note.

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "This large map displays the elevate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This large map displays the elevated motorway called 8/81. The intake leading to Martinaise is marked with a blue X. There's another X on the off-ramp at a place called the Old South.

fields.Title: You: "What is that sound..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is that sound...

fields.Title: Shivers: "The rattle of motor carriages and l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The rattle of motor carriages and lorries driving through long forgotten tunnels. Lit by gas lights.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes?" He likes where this is going..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes?" He likes where this is going...

fields.Title: You: "And she's also the one running the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And she's also the one running the drug trade... What a handful.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is the one our man pointed to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is the one our man pointed to..." The lieutenant peeks inside.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Posters cover the small windows in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Posters cover the small windows in the back -- you can't make out what's on them.

fields.Title: You: "Try the door handle."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try the door handle.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The lady driver used this same rad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The lady driver used this same radio to evade Coalition authorities, and now you're using it to contact them directly. It's just ironic, that's all."

fields.Title: You: ""To be honest, I mostly just want t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To be honest, I mostly just want to ride on Coalition Warship Archer."

fields.Title: You: "Smash the window in with the prybar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smash the window in with the prybar.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (CheckItem("prybar")  or  CheckItem("kvalsund_multitool"))  and  CheckItem("key_abandoned_lorry") == false  and  Variable["jam.abandoned_open_smash_white"]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A besmertie is a Revacholian crime..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A besmertie is a Revacholian crime syndicate. They see themselves as the inheritors of the 14 Revacholian indotribes, but really they're just violent gangs vying for control on the West side of Revachol..."

fields.Title: Abandoned Lorry: "This municipal map from the Thirtie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This municipal map from the Thirties displays a complex system of storm sewers underneath a sub-district called The Pox (Old Military Hospital), right adjacent to the 41st Precinct.

fields.Title: You: "Say "Welcome to Revachol, window!"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say "Welcome to Revachol, window!" and smash it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right. But we should still..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. But we should still go and see what Titus has got to say on the matter." He writes something down into his little notebook. "Are we finished with the lorry?"
